name: Steam Tactics
description: Welcome aboard your airship, captain! Engage in tactical combats, upgrade your ships and weapons, level up your pilots.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher recommended, though even Windows XP SP2+ should work Processor: Intel Core2 Duo, equivalent or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
